briefdescription.para: Initializes the cFE core module API Library.

detaileddescription.para:
cFE Core task early init prototypes Description
Initializes the cFE core module API Library Assumptions, External Events, and Notes:
This function MUST be called before any module API's are called.

briefdescription.para: Removes EVS resources associated with specified Application.

simplesect.title: Description
simplesect.para: This function is called by cFE Executive Services to cleanup after an Application has been terminated. It frees resources that have been allocated to the specified Application.

briefdescription.para: Entry Point for cFE Core Application.

simplesect.title: Description
simplesect.para: This is the entry point to the cFE EVS Core Application.
